channel.title: How do I make people have membership?
channel.description:
How do I make it so that it will let people (or not let people) have membership on my server? For example:
If a guy had membership, how would I be able to make him have not membership?
or
If a guy didn't have membership how could I make him have membership?
Please help me!!!

item.title: How do I make people have membership?
item.dc:creator: @novar2 novar2
item.description:
@novar2 wrote:

I don’t have a makemem command.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make people have membership?

item.title: How do I make people have membership?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Go to your folder that says data, right click and make a notepad and save it as

members

Then add this command to your client java

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && playerRights > 0) { { try { String victim = command.substring(8); sendMessage(""+victim+""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } } }

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make people have membership?
